Whether you’re running errands or lounging with the girls, this 3 piece set makes looking put-together a no-brainer.

warm-weather dressing. Designed with crisp pleats and a clean high-rise fit, this high waisted summer skirt nails the balance
between structured and breezy.

The cotton-blend fabric keeps it light and breathable while holding its shape. It is perfect for everything from slow brunches to
street-style strolls.

This off white dress is all about grace with a twist. The criss-cross front and flared hem add that vintage charm, while the
tie-back bow keeps it playful and sweet. Lightweight and flowy, it's made for slow mornings and soft moments.

Whether you're heading out for coffee or just twirling around for the vibe, this off white dress brings easy elegance to your day.


ABOUT THE PRODUCT



Country of Origin

Proudly Made in India

Brand

Littlebox India (LBI)

Pack Contains

1 piece






WHY THIS PRODUCT?

 * Criss-cross bodice with bow detail for a standout look
 * Comfortable to wear
 * Flared silhouette gives effortless flow


HOW TO STYLE

Day Look: Add flats and a straw tote

Evening Look: Pair with kitten heels and gold studs
